description: This file contains macro definitions, function prototypes, include directives, and constants related to WAN management utilities in a network device. It provides interfaces for starting, stopping, restarting applications, process management, system commands, and specific health check features.

methods.name: WanManager_DoStartApp
methods.description: Utility function to start an application with specified command-line arguments.

methods.name: WanManager_DoRestartApp
methods.description: Utility function to restart an application with specified command-line arguments.

methods.name: WanManager_DoStopApp
methods.description: Utility function to stop a specified application.

methods.name: WanManager_DoCollectApp
methods.description: Function to clean zombie processes of a specified application.

methods.name: WanManager_DoSystemAction
methods.description: Executes a system command, coming from a specified caller.

methods.name: WanManager_DoSystemActionWithStatus
methods.description: Executes a system command and returns the status of the call.

methods.name: CollectApp
methods.description: Collects zombie processes by process ID.

methods.name: WanManager_StartIpoeHealthCheckService
methods.description: Starts the IPoE health check service, returning the process ID upon success.

methods.name: WanManager_StopIpoeHealthCheckService
methods.description: Stops the IPoE health check service using the process ID.

methods.name: GetPathToApp
methods.description: Finds and returns the system path of a specified application.

methods.name: WanManager_GetDateAndUptime
methods.description: Retrieves system date and uptime.

methods.name: WanManager_getUpTime
methods.description: Returns system uptime in seconds.

methods.name: util_spawnProcess
methods.description: Spawns a new process, returning its process ID.

methods.name: util_terminateProcessForcefully
methods.description: Forcefully terminates a process by PID.

methods.name: util_signalProcess
methods.description: Sends a signal to a process identified by PID.

methods.name: util_getPidByName
methods.description: Retrieves process ID by process name.

methods.name: util_getNameByPid
methods.description: Gets the process name for a given PID.

methods.name: util_collectProcess
methods.description: Collects a process, with a timeout.

methods.name: util_runCommandInShellBlocking
methods.description: Runs a shell command in a blocking manner.

methods.name: util_getZombiePidByName
methods.description: Finds zombie processes by process name.

methods.name: WanManager_Util_GetShell_output
methods.description: Reads output from a shell command executed via a FILE pointer.

methods.name: WanMgr_RestartUpdateCfg
methods.description: Updates WAN configuration parameters.

methods.name: WanMgr_RestartUpdateCfg_Bool
methods.description: Updates WAN configuration parameters of type boolean.
